thought: Implement mainWorkflow to process the manual trigger, use AI completion to classify the news title, and send the result to Slack.
plan: Build the AI input messages with system and user prompt including the news title.
Call the AI completion action with the built messages.
Extract the category from AI response.
Format the Slack message with the news title and category.
Call the Slack action to post the message to #general channel.
criticism: The current code lacks workflow implementation, so no processing happens after the trigger. The AI input and Slack message formatting need to be carefully handled to avoid errors.
